dmca.title: Formula One: AV infringements - FOM_NRID13340
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jim Chen [mailto:JimC@nr-online.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, May 11, 2006 9:55 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Formula One: AV infringements - FOM_NRID13340
Subject: Formula One: AV infringements - FOM_NRID13340



NetResult Internal Reference:  FOM_NRID13340

 

Please quote the above FOM_NRID13340 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue.

 

Dear Sirs 

 

Formula One Administration Limited ("FOA") has the exclusive right to commercially
exploit the FIA Formula One World Championship ("the Championship") including, but
not limited to, all moving images, other audio/video content, timing data and
results.  In addition, FOA's associated is the owner of numerous trademark
applications and registrations throughout the world relating to the Championship,
including F1
